description:
I can't keep the cameras turned on constantly but I wish I could have with these two! It turns out that Robert had seen Allen at the hotel before they met, and Robert shared that he had his fingers crossed that he'd be on the receiving end of Allen's cock!
That explained a lot when they finally did meet. Allen kind of giggled about it when he recognized Robert. But Robert wasted no time and went right for him. He pushed Allen up against the wall and started making out with him. There wasn't even any time for me to get a reaction from them! The next think I knew, Robert had Allen's cock in his mouth and the fucking had begun.
Robert's definitely an aggressive bottom! He kept pushing back on Allen's cock and it was clear he loved every minute of it. He's also very vocal so you might want to adjust your speakers for this one!
title: Robert & Allen
